      • checkKeywords

        private java.lang.Boolean checkKeywords(org.apache.tika.metadata.Metadata metadata)
        Check keywords metadata of a file. A user can specify in the Query how many keywords should be present for the query to be successful
        Parameters:
        metadata - Metadata variable

      • checkDate

        private java.lang.Boolean checkDate(org.apache.tika.metadata.Metadata metadata)
                             throws java.text.ParseException
        Check date metadata of a file. Consider also the operation in the query if the date should be BEFORE, EQUAL or AFTER the given one
        Parameters:
        metadata - Metadata variable
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
